overview.summary: Read in a series of mds files and output a single NrrdData with a time axis of size equal to the number of files read.

description.p: Using the browser from the UI button, select the first file in the series. All subsequently numerated files in that directory will be read and added to the time axis.

The Fusion Field Reader reads an ASCII file and output the following fields of data stored in a NrrdData. Pressure, Temperature, Magnetic, Velosity. The format of the data uses a keyword token followed by zero or more values and is as follows:
Field layout (token = FIELDS 'number of fields' 'field descriptor' ...)
Dimensions and end condition (token = DIMENSIONS token = REPEATED or SINGULAR dim dim dim)

The field descriptors may be in any order but the grid should be first followed by the data. The descriptors may as follows: GRID_R_Z_PHI, BFIELD_R_Z_PHI, VFIELD_R_Z_PHI, PRESSURE, TEMPERATURE. With vector data the field may in X-Y-Z, R-Z-PHI, or R-PHI-Z.
